name: Multi-Agent System with A2A Protocol
description: A coordinated system of three specialized AI agents (Research, Analysis, Expert) implementing the Agent2Agent protocol for seamless collaboration

skills.name: Collaborative Task Execution
skills.description: Coordinate multiple agents to work together on complex tasks following the research → analysis → expert workflow

skills.name: Individual Agent Routing
skills.description: Route tasks to specific agents based on task type and requirements

skills.name: External API Integration
skills.description: Integrate with multiple external APIs including Tavily, NewsAPI, OpenWeather, and more
